titleStmt.title: Of the lawful and vnlawful vsurie amo[n]gest Christians, added by Wolfgang Muscul vnto the ende of his booke vppon the Psalmes
De usuris ex verbo Dei. English
titleStmt.author: Musculus, Wolfgang, 1497-1563.
T. L., fl. 1556.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: De usuris ex verbo Dei.
At end, with caption title: An aduertismente of the translatoure. T.L.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
